text: Aloysius Snosie Simujla (born 22 June 1994) is a Liberian footballer who plays for LPRC Oilers, as a left back. ==Career== Born in Monrovia, Simujla has played club football for FC Fassell and LPRC Oilers. He made his international debut for Liberia in 2013. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Liberian footballers Category:Liberia international footballers Category:FC Fassell players Category:LPRC Oilers players Category:Association football fullbacks
title: Aloysius Simujla
